env GO111MODULE=on

# GOPROXY file paths must provide the "file://" prefix explicitly.
env GOPROXY=$WORK/proxy
! go list -versions -m golang.org/x/text
stderr 'GOPROXY must be a valid URL or HTTPS path'

[!net] stop

env GOPROXY=proxy.golang.org
go list -versions -m golang.org/x/text

-- go.mod --
module example.com
go 1.13
-- $WORK/proxy/README.md --
This proxy contains no data.
